title: lol riots server won't let me join fantastic

replies.body:
Yer server crushed.

The longest champ select EVER, frozen in time and if we leave we can't reconnect back.

Riot server please.
rip. lel i might just go watch more jormungand

ahhhh was wondering why my ping was so high for the entire game until everyone dcd instantaiously ahaha
gotta admit im abit relieved its not my internet atleast





*fingers crossed its a
 loss prevented*

servers are down pretty sure. everyone dc'd

in my game 6 people dc'd, left us 2v2. then the rest dc'd.
Yep, mid game dc, can't reconnect. Probably won't even be loss prevented knowing riot :).

Everyone in my game just dc'd so.

Best servers ~~NA ~~ OCE
now I'm going join in 5 minutes late and be 6 levels behind good work riot your game works very well
